# subscript(_:)

**Instance Subscript**

Gets or sets the component of the specified type.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency subscript<T>(componentType: T.Type) -> T? where T : Component { get set }
```

## Accessing members

- **subscript(_:)**: Gets or sets the component with a specific dynamically supplied type.
